reviews.title: Friendly
reviews.text: They are friendly and give a pay raise. Treat you well and you can work from home. Amazing workplace and colleagues are really helpful and they would help you any time.

reviews.title: Great! Love insurance and support
reviews.text: The team is always holding your back as a host. Payment is always on time and the insurance cover is amazing. Nothing to compare about being a Booking host. Airbnb is amazing.

reviews.title: Toxic, sanctimonious culture
reviews.text: Worst culture I've ever experienced. The "core values" are just for show. Leadership tolerates bad/discriminatory behavior from top performers and then just pays out the victims when they sue.

reviews.title: Well paid experience in a quasi start-up environment but little room for advancement
reviews.text:
What is the best part of working at the company?
Intelligent, creative and dedicated people. 

What is the most stressful part about working at the company?
The group I was in cultivated an environment of stress and chaos. 

What is the work environment and culture like at the company?
Not great for the group I worked in. Overall at the company there is a decided bias against older workers.

reviews.title: Great communication
reviews.text: Great communication very nice to work for owner of property. Very understanding, good schedule, pays on time and always available to communicate when there are questions.

reviews.title: Host/ property manager
reviews.text: Property manager can be a rewarding job. With the correct team it can be very easy. Otherwise it can be a nightmare if you do not have the essential crew of

reviews.title: Fun Workplace
reviews.text: Great place to work. Always meeting new people, and changing up the stay environment. One aspect that is nice is the self checkin, and self checkout.

reviews.title: Good for first job
reviews.text:
It was a good job. You choose your shifts but normally you have a set of apartments to clean.

I would recommend as a first job because you can learn a lot.

reviews.title: Own business
reviews.text: Running a short term rental business can be very stressful, guest may call you in the middle of the night to request something. And there is a lot of do and don'ts.

reviews.title: Cultural, gratyful
reviews.text:
What is the best part of working at the company?
Host , receiving  people all over the world 
Sharing experiences and   Activities, love, cultures

What is the most stressful part about working at the company?
Scammers ,  bad people.
Cancelations last minutes

reviews.title: Eccellente
reviews.text:
Quali sono gli aspetti migliori del tuo ruolo presso lazienda?
Mi piace moltissimo lavorare come host di airbnb, a Ostuni vengono persone da tutto il mondo e il servizio funziona molto bene 

Quali sono gli aspetti più stressanti del ruolo presso lazienda?
La gestione degli ospiti non è sempre facile per problematiche varie che possono presentarsi 

Come sono lambiente e la cultura lavorativi presso lazienda?
Molto buoni, la community di host è di grande supporto 

Come si svolge una tua tipica giornata lavorativa presso lazienda?
Rispondere alle e- mail contattare il co host per la pulizia e la preparazione degli appartamenti , organizzare check in check out

reviews.title: Horrible company
reviews.text: Company is horrible.   Pay is great but experience with company is absolutely horrible.  To many employees don't care about their job.  Needs a complete overhaul in every department.

reviews.title: Profitable
reviews.text: Enjoyable work with excellent support from the company. I mentor new hosts for success. I highly recommend short term rental work in the metro Detroit area.

reviews.title: good
reviews.text: its a good place to host and makes money more than other rentals. the guests can be obnoxious but not all the time. its good you cantata their deposits if the damage your stuff

reviews.title: Draining and no raise
reviews.text: Working here feels very miserable. There’s no pay raises and the customers are very rude and expect you to do things beyond your pay. No tips and it’s very boring and draining working here.

reviews.title: Stressful
reviews.text: Not a good project , u will be micro managing if u did mistake , even u are a newbiew u might get warning letter there is no chance for u to appeal. The policy always changing from time to time.

reviews.title: Host saturation
reviews.text: building brand with more host and less support. That growth now has host over saturation and quality of filtering guest going down. Its not as passive in income as those might believe.

reviews.title: Schlimmster Job
reviews.text:
Es wurden nach 2 Wochen bereits neue Mitarbeiter gekündigt, alle waren sehr unfreundlich und inkompetent, man wurde dort sogar beleidigt und die vorgesetzten haben nicht mal dann etwas unternommen.
Wirklich der schlimmste Arbeitgeber den ich je hatte ich würde niemandem jemals empfehlen dort zu arbeiten.

reviews.title: Work Culture was world class before pandemic, now it's above average
reviews.text: Having spent a lot of time at Airbnb I can say that it isn't the place to work that it once was. That being said, I'd still choose it above almost anywhere else - most aspects of the company are something I continue to seek in my employers.

reviews.title: Amazing place to work before the pandemic
reviews.text: Worked there and was laid off during the pandemic. Still my favorite company to work for. The remote work culture has only strengthened since then. Obviously recommend!
